name: Falling Into Dreams
description:
Can you Find out what is Hiding in your Brain and Corrupting your Dreams?

Fight against Fragmented Frogman, Glitched Raceman and F̴̬̮̚͝a̴̳͗͊̀͜n̸̰͆t̷̳̞̭̀a̶̬͇̓͜s̴̥̀̀͛ẏ̵͉



Battle with Crazy F̴̬̮̚͝a̴̳͗͊̀͜n̸̰͆t̷̳̞̭̀a̶̬͇̓͜s̴̥̀̀͛ẏ̵͉ who is trying to Take Over Your Brain!



Your Childhoods Favorite Toy has Awakened... Now he Wants to Eat You for Dinner...



Your once Favorite Video Game Character isn't the Happiest that You didn't Beat his High Score all Those years ago...

Blast trough 3 Amazing Stages who are Occupied by a Monsters who Remind you of your Childhood Traumas...





Super Fast and nerve-wracking Parkour... Can you Become the Master of Dreams?



Collect as many Balloons as You Can to Make Your Cart Lightning Fast!



Complete the Parkour Maze Before Lava Reaches You And FrogMan Eats You Alive!
